errors.message: Specification prescribes implementation; violates No Implementation.

notes: All intents are considered verifiable under core association rules.
Constraint constraints.C1 exists and is evaluable.
Decision decisions.D1 supports intents.I1 and respects constraints.C1.
Validations are executable using declared capabilities (emit_structured_validation, emit_structured_errors).

evidence.value: implementation_notes contains algorithmic and procedural directives (B-Tree, LRU, Big-O, scheduled job).
